profile_summary:
As a Senior Web Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in **TypeScript** and **API Integration**, ensuring seamless connectivity and robust functionality in applications. My proficiency in **gRPC** optimizes communication between services, while my strong skills in **Dependency Management** and **Build Tooling** guarantee smooth and efficient development workflows. I excel in **SDK Development** and maintain thorough **Documentation**, which enhances team collaboration and encourages efficient problem-solving.

Additionally, I bring extensive experience in full-stack development with **React**, **Node.js**, and **FastAPI**, complemented by my knowledge of **Cloud Services** like **Azure** and **AWS**. I have successfully led the development of high-performance solutions focused on the healthcare and financial sectors, incorporating AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and automation. With a solid understanding of microservices architecture and event-driven systems, I create secure applications that comply with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
